thread.title: India-Pakistan series is bigger than Ashes: ICC president Zaheer Abbas
thread.title_full: India-Pakistan series is bigger than Ashes: ICC president Zaheer Abbas - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: India-Pakistan series is bigger than Ashes: ICC president Zaheer Abbas
text: Karachi, Oct 14: ICC president Zaheer Abbas has said that a Pakistan and India bilateral series is bigger than the Ashes and should be revived. "Unfortunately the ICC can't do anything in this matter since it is a bilateral series but Â»
